welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Welwyn, a charming city known for its beautiful green spaces and rich history. We invite you to explore our picturesque streets and immerse yourself in the local culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited access or speed.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport offers a modern and comfortable environment for travelers.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Northolt Airport provides VIP services and amenities for private and business jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, London City Airport offers a dedicated terminal with luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Wifi is free for all passengers and can be accessed throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights for Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights for Oneworld and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights for SkyTeam and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights for British Airways and its partners.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport offers a modern and convenient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.
